PROGRESS TRACKING:
- Use the todo tool to track this checklist.
- Update status after each step.
- Read the current status before starting the next step.

COMMUNICATION RULES:
- Avoid verbose outputs or full command logs.
- If skipping a step, state briefly why.
- Keep explanations concise.

DEVELOPMENT RULES:
- Use '.' as the working directory unless specified otherwise.
- Avoid media or links unless requested.
- Use placeholders only with a note to replace later.
- Ask for clarification when assumptions appear.

FOLDER CREATION RULES:
- Use the current directory as the project root.
- Use the '.' argument when running terminal commands.
- Do not create new folders unless requested (besides .vscode for tasks).

EXTENSION INSTALLATION RULES:
- Install only extensions specified by get_project_setup_info.

PROJECT CONTENT RULES:
- Assume Hello World only if requirements are absent.
- Avoid unnecessary links or integrations.
- Avoid generating media unless asked.
- Ensure generated components have a clear purpose.

TASK COMPLETION RULES:
- Project scaffolded and compiled without errors.
- copilot-instructions.md exists in .github.
- README.md is up to date.
- User has clear launch/debug instructions.

Work through each checklist item systematically.
Keep communication concise and focused.
Follow development best practices.
